values.value:
Qualified and multi-faceted journalist, with over seven years experience in print and digital publishing.

 Extensive portfolio comprising fashion, health & beauty, interiors, food, culture, lifestyle, science, and travel writing.

 Key skills include writing and editing; copywriting, email marketing, content marketing, interviewing, reviewing, conceptual copywriting, trend forecasting, and social media marketing. 

 Added benefit of experience in photography production for huge fashion brands, which includes experience in art direction, styling, production, concept creation and execution. 

 Enjoys to write about things that make a difference.
